name: Brick Rigs
description: Build your own vehicles or download one of more than 50,000 vehicles from the workshop and enjoy the dynamic driving and destruction physics of Brick Rigs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 - Windows 10 (x64) Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
